Title: Establishes a returning veterans tax credit for businesses that hire veterans and disabled veterans
Summary: Establishes a returning veterans tax credit for businesses that hire veterans and disabled veterans; provides that such tax credit is worth $3,000 per veteran hired or $4,000 for every disabled veteran hired and the total benefit shall not exceed $15,000 annually.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to establishing a returning veterans tax credit for businesses that hire veterans and disabled veterans
